articles.title: Eight charged under the Emirates Cricket Board Anti-Corruption Code - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The International Cricket Council (ICC), on behalf of the Emirates Cricket Board (ECB), has charged eight players and officials for breaching different counts of the ECB Anti-Corruption Code for Participants for the T10 League (the ‘Code’).
